alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Calhoun; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southeastern Lexington, northeastern Aiken and northwestern Orangeburg Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gaston to 9 miles northeast of Aiken State Park. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gaston, Sandy Run, Swansea, Wagener, North, Pelion, Salley, Perry, Woodford, Aiken Gopher Tortoise Heritage Preserve, Perry Airport, New Zion, Lexington County Airport At Pelion, Lexington Acres Pond, Peachtree Rock, Thor and New Holland. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 122 and 137. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
